page.title: 08Little Weald Hall
page.content: Mr Folds is the owner of Little Weald Hall. He has on his farm 150 acres. 20 acres grass and 130 acres crops. His crops are wheat, barley and grass. His equipment is tractors. The animals are cows. The animals are cows. He has 23 heifers, 1 bull and 89 milking cows. He keeps them in 1 calf shed, 2 cow sheds and 1 milking shed.The bull is a brown and ginger and he has a big ring through his nose. Mr Folds said that when the bull was born he had the ring put through his nose so he is easily controlled.
